long_description: Ready for the trails, the Scott Aspect 940 29er hardtail mountain bike features a 100mm suspension fork, a Shimano 27-speed drivetrain and hydraulic brakes for great big-wheeled performance. Sturdy 6061 double-butted aluminum frame withstands demands of trail use and supplies great handling; replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend usable life of frame. Suntour XCM-29-HLO fork smooths out rough trails with100mm of travel; fork can be locked out for more efficient climbing. Shimano shifters and derailleurs snap through the 27 gear combinations for quick, precise shifts. Shimano hydraulic disc brakes provide powerful stopping power and easy speed management in even the muddiest trail conditions. Alex rims are outfitted with Impac Ridgepac tires for all-terrain handling and traction. Specs on the Scott Aspect 940 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
